title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             Manhattan Project News       The National Park Service makes every effort to keep the public informed about news events, accomplishments, employee recognitions, special and recurring events which take place within and around the units of the National Park System.  Manhattan Project publishes a park newspaper two times a year which focuses on up-coming events and contains articles of interest to the reader.  Manhattan Project NHP provides press releases to local and regional newspapers. The park also posts current news releases, past news releases and newsletters on its website.      Â    In February 2016, the NPS and DOE held workshops in Oak Ridge, Hanford, and Los Alamos to begin developing the Foundation document for Manhattan Project National Park. Open houses were held in each of the communities to gather input from the communities related to the important resources, stories and opportunities for the park.    Read a summary of the comments. Work on the document is continuing and is expected to be complete in late 2016.
